amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE X--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 10001. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the Leonard Wood Research Institute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available for the Leonard Wood Research Institute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 62 - 363 (Roll no. 304).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Flake.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 62 - 363 (Roll no. 304).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
